Posts.Content: Hi I was diagnosed last Dec with stage 3w oa..whatever..breast caner..had chemo, L-mastectomy, then 32 radiation treatments...my original diagnosis was metatastic axio carcinoma in L breast. they took out a baseball size mass of lypmnodes..had to send to San Diego lab to find primary site..came back 83% breast cancer..so we went that route...had my 1st follow up PAT scan yesterday...get results next Thursday....can anyone tell me what the statisics show for me for re-occurance..and more imporatanly...are there any statistics to show if your "mood"..really can effect a re-occurance??..Plzz... thank you so much
Posts.Title: Breast cancer re-occurance...

Posts.Content: Thank You very much for your reponse. I don't know if i had this test...had sooo many...i don't know if i mentioned that my cancer was a CUP cancer...they sent a sample to a San DiegoÂ  forensics lab to see if they could tell where it came from, as all the normal "biopsy" and blood tests came back neg/undetermined. Does this change your response at all? Reason why i ask is that they were only 83% sure it was breast cancer... i have had a "first look" PET scan, however and it showed i'm remissed....which ocourse is great, but i'm not sure what my re-occurance rate would be??
Posts.Title: Breast cancer re-occurance...
